results.title: Physicochemical and pathohistological changes in experimental fibrosarcoma tumors of hamsters treated with metformin and itraconazole
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may have the potential to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma metastasis@@@.

results.title: Metformin induces CD11b+-cell-mediated growth inhibition of an osteosarcoma: implications for metabolic reprogramming of myeloid cells and anti-tumor effects
results.text_hl: Regulation of these cell types is a primary goal for achieving efficient @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ immunotherapy. We found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@) induces @GENE_ITGAM @GENE_16409 @@@CD11b@@@+-cell-mediated growth inhibition of a @CELLLINE_CVCL:V454 @@@K7M2neo@@@ @DISEASE_Osteosarcoma @DISEASE_MESH:D012516 @@@osteosarcoma@@@ independent of T cells, as growth inhibition of @CELLLINE_CVCL:V454 @@@K7M2neo@@@ was still observed in wild-type (WT) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ depleted of T cells by antibodies and in @DISEASE_X_Linked_Combined_Immunodeficiency_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D053632 @@@SCID@@@; this contrasted with the effect of @GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@Met@@@ on @CELLLINE_CVCL:5798 @@@Meth A@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005354 @@@fibrosarcoma@@@, which was entirely T-cell-dependent.

PMID: 30508092
